name: fetch_url
description: Retrieve web page content from a specified URL using a stealth browser. Supports content extraction, media blocking, optional navigation waits, and saving output to a local file.

url.description: The URL to fetch content from.

timeout.description: Page loading timeout in milliseconds. Default is 30000 (30s).

wait_until.description: When navigation is considered complete. Default is 'load'.

extract_content.description: The content extraction strategy. 'summary' returns summary using the Readability library; 'clean_content' cleans and extracts main article; 'full_content' returns raw HTML.

max_length.description: Truncate returned content if it exceeds this character length. 0 = no limit.

return_html.description: If true, returns raw HTML. If false, returns Markdown. Default is false.

wait_for_navigation.description: Whether to wait for additional navigation after page load. Useful for bot checks.

navigation_timeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for any extra navigation after initial load.

disable_media.description: Block images, fonts, stylesheets, and media to reduce resource usage. Default is true.

debug.description: If true, opens visible browser window instead of headless mode. Default is false.

save_path.description: Optional. If provided, saves fetched content to this file path (e.g. './output/page.md').
